alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pittsylvania and west central Halifax Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Keeling, or near Blairs, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blairs... Mt Airy... Ingram... Java... Leda... Keeling... and Ringgold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and central, south central and west central Virginia.
